Mahadum Anchor bụ mahadum Ndị Kraịst nke onwe nke Deeper Christian Life Ministry nwere
Mahadum ahụ dị na Ayobo, Ipaja, Lagos State, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Nigeria.

Usoro nke ịtọ ntọala Mahadum Anchor kwụrụ ụgwọ maka Septemba 2012, mana ọ tara nnukwu ihe ndọghachi azụ ka ndị nnọchi anya NUC na-abịa maka nyocha ikpeazụ na nkwado nke ọtụtụ ijeri ọrụ ha nọ na ihe mberede Dana Air

Prọfesọ Celestine Onwuliri, di nke onye minista na-eje ozi na onye isi nchịkwa na Kọmitii Mahadum Naịjirịa so n'ime ihe karịrị mmadụ otú narị na iri ise na asaa nwụrụ na ihe mberede ụgbọelu Dana nke mere na Sunday, June 3, 2012
Ọ bụ onye ndú nke otu ahụ
E bidoro owuwu ya n'afọ 2013. Mahadum ahụ tọrọ ntọala na 2014 site na Deeper Christian Life Ministry. Otu Nigeria University Commission (NUC) kwadoro mahadum ahụ na Wednesday, 2 November 2016.
E nwere ngalaba atọ na mahadum ahụ.
